*p**location_mentioned*Ayish */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-22-1832">Nov 22. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir ; that purity of sentiment evinced in your letter—and denying that distinction that *person_mentioned*public */person_mentioned*opinion was willing to give is in an instance of self denial—not ordinary.*/p*
*p*I am truely sorry that you declined standing a poll.*/p*
*p*You very modestly expressed yourself as to your military Capacity— common observation often Justify the belief; that those; best qualified pretend least.*/p*
*p*That the fate of *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*will depend upon the people themselves but little doubt; and of the efficiency of our *person_mentioned*Militia */person_mentioned*as little.*/p*
*p*I think that we have reason to fear that our constituted *person_mentioned*authorities*/person_mentioned* have not felt sufficient strong the impressions of *person_mentioned*freeman*/person_mentioned*: so common and almost inherent to *person_mentioned*people born in *location_mentioned*U. S.*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* to extend freely those rights, which the habits and education of *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*have taught them that they have a right to demand and short of which will never be satisfyed.*/p*
*p*The habits and political arangments of *person_mentioned*Mexicans*/person_mentioned*; are of a character calculated to produce a fear that nothing but fear; will prompt them to extend to the *person_mentioned*people of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* the exercise of equal rights.*/p*
*p*Had you continued to be a *person_mentioned*condidate*/person_mentioned*; you would have recd a common support; with us.*/p*
*p*I will thank you if you please to give me the names of all the *person_mentioned*Empresarios */person_mentioned*their limits and *location_mentioned*places of residence*/location_mentioned*, their *person_mentioned*agents */person_mentioned*and their *location_mentioned*residences*/location_mentioned**/p*.
*p*Do you think that there is any reason to believe that the *person_mentioned*President of*location_mentioned* U. S.*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* will force the line to *location_mentioned*snow river*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Has the law or laws, regulating the duties of *person_mentioned*Alcalda*/person_mentioned*, been translated or printed if so will you please inform my *person_mentioned*son */person_mentioned*how to procure them.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W. McFarland*/person_mentioned**/p*
